title: Entrepreneurship: Silicon Valley vs. Munich – Part 1
dc:creator: Florian Hartl
description:
Half a year ago, I was working in the heart of Silicon Valley and attended many meetups and networking parties – yes, I would call them parties rather than events. It became obvious to me that I wanted to try to get my own business started once I would get back to Munich a few months later. Hence, starting in May, I showed up at many networking events for entrepreneurs in Munich in order to get to know the local Startup crowd. Also, I began to work for the startup smarchive which has an amazing team and creates a fascinating product.…

The post Entrepreneurship: Silicon Valley vs. Munich – Part 1 appeared first on Florian Hartl.
